price: Enti (Nkͻmhyεni), wodeε tu (amanfoͻ no) fo; na wo Wura Nyankopͻn adom ho nti no wonnyε pε-adeε-hununi anaa ͻbͻdamfoͻ.
arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūnin
